```{r load packages}
#install.packages("pacman")
pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
```

```{r source preprocessing function}
# load data
data <- load("data/IGTdata.rdata")
# source preprocessing function
source("data_preprocessing.R")

# make three different dataframes 
trials_95 <- data_preprocessing(choice_95, wi_95, lo_95)
trials_100 <- data_preprocessing(choice_100, wi_100, lo_100)
trials_150 <- data_preprocessing(choice_150, wi_150, lo_150)

# make one big dataframe 
trials_all <- rbind(trials_95, trials_100, trials_150)
```
